title: Which Ibanez guitar model has a Floyd Rose bridge in the price range of 20-30k rupees ($300-$500)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ibanez grg270dx is the one that fits right in your budget. But as someone else has already mentioned, Floyd rose bridge on a budget is not that good, you'll have a tough time tuning it. Ibanez grg170dx is the same guitar with FAT10 floating bridge which will be easier to tune than the Floyd rose. And it's a really good axe you'll love the slim neck profile with jumbo frets and low action. I set up my own guitar and it's never a problem, I usually lock the bridge and make whatever adjustments necessary. Goodluck!

Ibanez GRG 270. It costs around INR 21K. It's pretty shitty though (as are all low budget Floyd Rose tremolos) and a nightmare to set up. I think I spent more time tuning my guitar than actually playing it when I owned one. If you can't extend your budget, you'd be better off getting a fixed bridge or a regular tremolo. Floyd Roses are pretty much a novelty in most genres anyways.
